name: Send an SMS via Twilio from a new feature in ArcGIS Field Maps
description:
Every time a new feature is created in ArcGIS Field Maps, an SMS will be instantly sent via Twilio.

Note that the template works with a sample Debris map described in this [article.](https://www.esri.com/arcgis-blog/products/field-maps/field-mobility/automate-email-notifications-for-field-updates/)

You can use your own maps and layers but you will need to adjust mappings in the last module.
